sense.def:
To synthesize a substance
pomeni ustvariti neko snov s kemičnimi ali biološkimi reakcijami;

seg.quote: ...proteins which the body is unable to synthesise for itself.

sense.def:
To synthesize different ideas, facts, or experiences
pomeni združiti različne ideje, dejstva ali izkušnje, da iz njih ustvarimo enotno idejo ali vtis;

seg.quote: They synthesise their experience into principles and theories.
